comment.text: Indicates who shared a file or document. This text appears as a column header in tables and as a filter label, signifying the sharer of a file. Translators should ensure the meaning conveys the concept of file sharing and attribution.

usage.context:
enable: nameColumnIsEnabled,
 sortBy: SortByFieldName.Name,
 onClick: this.onFilter,
 },
 {
 key: "SharedByShareWithMe",
 title: t("SharedBy"),
 enable: sharedByShareWithMeColumnIsEnabled,
 resizable: true,
 onChange: this.onColumnChange,
 },
